recess.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a time during the day or year when no work is done, especially in parliament, law courts etc
recess.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a short period of time between lessons at a school when children can go outdoors and play
recess.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Her favorite things at school are music and recess.
recess.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a space in the wall of a room, especially for shelves, cupboards etc
recess.translation[1].definitions[0].def: if a government, law court etc recesses, it officially stops work for a period of time
